name: Middle of Nowhere (itch)
description:
Welcome to a classic theme text based adventure!
  1. There was only 1 minute left when I finished writing the game, I apologize for any bug.
  2. the game is written in basic, the source file is attached.
  3. I left the developer commands in case you get stuck on any. Still, I tried the game, and it can be finished as as intended
  4. I apologize for the probable grammatical errors, I did not have time to check the translations
